t: Brands To Know: Hozen Luxury Vegan Bags & Accessories – Immaculate Vegan
s: February 9, 2020 - Hozen is a super cool LA-based vegan bags and accessories brand whose name means 'conservation' in Japanese. Founded in 2018, they're known for their colourful, playful designs and shapes, and beautiful vegan leathers. We spoke to founder Rae Nicoletti. What led you to start Hozen?
